thread.section_title: Oil News | Gas News - Yahoo! Finance UK
thread.title: BUZZ-Shell: Gets leaner, meaner, fitter

title: BUZZ-Shell: Gets leaner, meaner, fitter
text:
1,822.50 +45.5000 
** Shell (LSE: RDSB.L - news ) 's UK-listed shares up 3 pct after the oil major reported market-beating Q2 profit 
** Co plans to cut 6,500 jobs, reduce spending and sell assets to deal with continued lower oil price 
** Co's dual-class shares top gainers on the bluechip FTSE 100 index and the STOXX Europe 600 oil and gas index 
** Co says on track to complete its $70 billion acquisition of BG Group (LSE: BG.L - news ) early next year 
** The combined co will be the world's leading LNG co and one the largest deepwater oil producers 
** BG shares also up about 2 pct at 1063.9 pence, with nearly a full day's average volume traded in the first hour and a half, and third biggest FTSE 100 gainer 
** Shell and BG shares the biggest boosts on the FTSE Thursday morning 
** BG reports Q2 earnings on July 31 (abhiram.nandakumar.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net)
